body: $AAPL Chart of The Day 12 January: #Apple can see further downside https://elliottwave-forecast.com/stock-market/elliott-wave-view-apple/  #elliottwave #trading #stocks

links.title: Elliott Wave View: Apple (AAPL) Can See Further Downside
links.description: Short Term Elliott Wave View in AAPL suggests the decline from January 04th peak is unfolding as a zig zag Elliott Wave structure. Down from January 04th high, wave ((i)) ended at 174.46. Wave ((ii)) bounce was a strong movement pullback completed at 179.80. Then the stock continued dropping to complete wave ((iii)) at 172.10.
